What: Barbara Walters , who had her own surgery to repair a faulty heart valve last year, addresses heart disease and the fear many have of a heart operation in A Matter of Life and Death. She talks to former Bill Clinton , David Letterman , Robin Williams and Regis Philbin , celebrities who've had heart surgeries. She also talks to doctors, including her own, about prevention and the warning signs of heart trouble.
